bug.author: mkschulze
bug.description: Hello, i'd like to join the community on slack, but the invitation link has expired. Please generate a new one. thx!

comments.comment: The pull request is merged. The updated link is <denchmark-link:https://join.slack.com/t/apache-mxnet/shared_invite/enQtNDQyMjAxMjQzMTI3LTkzMzY3ZmRlNzNjNGQxODg0N2Y5NmExMjEwOTZlYmIwYTU2ZTY4ZjNlMmEzOWY5MGQ5N2QxYjhlZTFhZTVmYTc>https://join.slack.com/t/apache-mxnet/shared_invite/enQtNDQyMjAxMjQzMTI3LTkzMzY3ZmRlNzNjNGQxODg0N2Y5NmExMjEwOTZlYmIwYTU2ZTY4ZjNlMmEzOWY5MGQ5N2QxYjhlZTFhZTVmYTc</denchmark-link> . The default website page currently points to 0.4.0 release. We are preparing 0.4.1 release which will happen soon, at which time the link on the default website will be updated.
